A Fantastic Fear of Everything (2012) 

I really want to see this movie thank you!

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2006040/

A/V = 9 M - 6

Quite boring and unbelievable. Its just that you never believe the main character can do what they make him out to be, a hard core killer. The action scenes are weak and the relationship between the two leads never goes anywhere. 

You sort of get the feeling that this might have a kind of Bourne style to it but it never gets there. The action scenes just weren't believable and you feel let down. I wouldn't recommend.
